text: (He paigambara) tapa'i bhanidinus ki allaha baheka jasako upasana timile garchau mala'i tiniharuko puja garnubata manahi gari'eko cha. Yo pani bhannus ki ma timra icchaharuko pachiâ€“pachi lagdina. Yadi yasto gardachu bhane pathavicalita hune chu ra sahi margaprapta manisaharumadhyebata hunechaina
